Title: Santa Sangre
Writer: Alejandro Jodorowsky (story), Roberto Leoni (story), Alejandro Jodorowsky (screenplay), Roberto Leoni (screenplay), Claudio Argento (screenplay)
Actors: Axel Jodorowsky, Blanca Guerra, Guy Stockwell, Thelma Tixou
Plot: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".
